Name: Blameless
About the game: Blameless is a 3D adventure focused on puzzle solving and story. Set in an unfinished house, the player is trying to escape a mysterious man. While you know how and why you got there, you could not foresee you were invited for a twisted purpose and itâ€™s upto you to investigate what happened and how to get out. This is a short, yet full title with an open ending. Take around 20 to 60 minutes to complete. Blameless Is Free Blameless is dedicated to the community! Gameplay Features Realistic puzzle solving Investigative approach Mysterious atmosphere Alternative puzzle solutions Story progression via exploration Character voice over Element of tension
